price: (43) Or have they a deity other than Allāh? Exalted is Allāh above whatever they associate with Him.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
